interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Mini Rubber Bands Soft Elastic Bands for Kids Hair Non-slip Rubber Hair Bands Soft Hair Elastics Ties Bands Braids Hair for Girls - STRONG - REUSEABLE (Colorful1000+Black1000) Review Date: 2020/08/11 Store: OLEWELL Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'Elastic', 'Brand': 'OLEWELL', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Number of Pieces': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 5 x 1 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SML'} Review Text: I for these to use for the ends of my side ponytail. When I use my regular bands. They are just too big and bulky and they tangle up.

So good thing about these are:
- they do not tangle my hair
- they stretch a bit but not too much
- they give you a ton of them so you don’t feel bad losing them

Con:
- they break fairly easy Review Title: Breaks fairly easy but you can plenty of them Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Hair Treatment Mask 120ml, 2019 PURC Magical Hair Mask, Deep Conditioner for Dry or Damaged Hair, 5 Seconds Repairs Damage Hair Root and Keratin GHEART {'Brand': 'GHEART', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Dull, Frizzy, Color Treated, Dry, Chemically Treated, Damaged', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '2.8 x 2.8 x 1.9 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Hair Treatment Mask-411', 'UPC': '778299243728'} I bought two masks to try out. This one for dry and damaged hair and a keratin one. First, I want to say my hair is very damaged. The top of my hair seems oily but the bottom is super dry. I buy regular conditioner from just any store and they never detangle my hair. My niece told me I needed to try a "hair mask." I had never heard of it but she swears by it. So I decided to give it a try. You guys, it really works. You have to follow the directions though and put it on your hair longer than what the bottle says. The more damaged your hair is, the longer you should keep it on. I left mine on for a long while.. I cant even remember how long. I think maybe 30 minutes? Anyhow, when I washed it off, my hair actually was actually easier to comb through. I wish I could find conditioners like this though b/c I don't want to spend so much washing my hair! leave on longer and it will be smoother PARWIN BEAUTY Curling Wand 5 in 1 Curling Iron Set with 5 Interchangeable Ceramic Barrels 0.5” to 1.25” Hair Curling Wand Set, Rose Gold PARWIN PRO BEAUTY {'Brand': 'PARWIN PRO BEAUTY', 'Hair Type': 'All, Curly, Fine, Normal', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Size': '1 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Package Dimensions': '10.1 x 4.8 x 3.2 inches; 2.55 Pounds', 'UPC': '658709253601', 'Manufacturer': 'PARWIN BEAUTY'} I returned this. Not worth it. was not as expected. Can't get a response returned Mini Rubber Bands Soft Elastic Bands for Kids Hair Non-slip Rubber Hair Bands Soft Hair Elastics Ties Bands Braids Hair for Girls - STRONG - REUSEABLE (Colorful1000+Black1000) OLEWELL {'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'Elastic', 'Brand': 'OLEWELL', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Number of Pieces': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 5 x 1 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SML'} I for these to use for the ends of my side ponytail. When I use my regular bands. They are just too big and bulky and they tangle up.

So good thing about these are:
- they do not tangle my hair
- they stretch a bit but not too much
- they give you a ton of them so you don’t feel bad losing them

Con:
- they break fairly easy Breaks fairly easy but you can plenty of them
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Type:** Prefers products for dry, damaged, and chemically treated hair, with concerns about oiliness at the roots and dryness at the ends.
- **Product Interests:** Interested in hair treatments, particularly masks that offer deep conditioning and hydration benefits. Recently showed interest in hair accessories, specifically non-slip elastic bands for styling, indicating adaptability in product use.
- **Usage Behavior:** Willing to experiment with new products, especially when recommended, but maintains a discerning approach. Demonstrated this by returning a recent purchase due to unmet expectations. Positive experiences noted with specific styles of accessories, although some had durability concerns.
- **Application Preferences:** Open to adjusting product application times and values following directions for optimal results, indicating a thoughtful approach to hair care.
- **Value Sensitivity:** Seeks effective products at a reasonable price, expressing frustration with the cost and performance of specialty items. This focus on value is further highlighted by a recent experience where an item fell short of expectations.
- **Brand Loyalty:** Open to exploring various brands, demonstrating a willingness to try different products in pursuit of better hair management while remaining cautious about investing in new styling tools.

Overall, the user is focused on finding effective, affordable hair care solutions aimed at repairing and hydrating damaged hair, while increasingly incorporating practical styling accessories into their routine, emphasizing the need for quality and durability.
